1094710.1134/10947.1573-8779Journal of Structural ChemistryJ Struct Chem0022-47661573-8779Pleiades PublishingMoscowS0022476618080231108310.1134/S0022476618080231ArticleSynthesis, Crystal Structure and Fluorescent Property of a Onedimensional Coordination Polymer Constructed By 1,3-Bis(1,2,4-Triazol-1-Ylmethyl)- Benzene And 4,4′-Oxydiphthalic AcidYuanC.1LiuS. N.1XuX. J.1c0000 0004 1791 6031grid.443649.8School of Chemistry and Chemical EngineeringYancheng Teachers University, YanchengJiangsuP.R. Chinaxxjyctu@gmail.com71201912201859819281934311220181772018712019© Pleiades Publishing, Ltd. 20182018Abstract

A one-dimensional Cd(II) complex [Cd(H3ODPT)2(MBTZ)2.2H2O]n (1) (MBTZ = 1,3-bis(1,2,4-triazol-1- yl-methyl)benzene, H4ODPT = 4,4′-oxydiphthalic acid) is synthesized and characterized using single crystal X-ray diffraction, IR spectroscopy, and elemental analysis. Single crystal X-ray diffraction analysis reveals that complex 1 is a one-dimensional double chain polymer containing 24-membered rings with MBTZ ligands as the bridges arranged parallel to the b crystal direction, while the singly deprotonated H4ODPT ligands are extended on both sides of such double chains. In addition, the luminescence measurements reveal that complex 1 exhibits strong fluorescent emission in the solid state at room temperature.

elements.content: A one-dimensional Cd(II) complex [Cd(H3ODPT)2(MBTZ)2.2H2O]n (1) (MBTZ = 1,3-bis(1,2,4-triazol-1- yl-methyl)benzene, H4ODPT = 4,4′-oxydiphthalic acid) is synthesized and characterized using single crystal X-ray diffraction, IR spectroscopy, and elemental analysis. Single crystal X-ray diffraction analysis reveals that complex 1 is a one-dimensional double chain polymer containing 24-membered rings with MBTZ ligands as the bridges arranged parallel to the b crystal direction, while the singly deprotonated H4ODPT ligands are extended on both sides of such double chains. In addition, the luminescence measurements reveal that complex 1 exhibits strong fluorescent emission in the solid state at room temperature.
elements.clean_text:
Abstract

A one-dimensional Cd(II) complex [Cd(H3ODPT)2(MBTZ)2.2H2O]n (1) (MBTZ = 1,3-bis(1,2,4-triazol-1- yl-methyl)benzene, H4ODPT = 4,4'-oxydiphthalic acid) is synthesized and characterized using single crystal X-ray diffraction, IR spectroscopy, and elemental analysis. Single crystal X-ray diffraction analysis reveals that complex 1 is a one-dimensional double chain polymer containing 24-membered rings with MBTZ ligands as the bridges arranged parallel to the b crystal direction, while the singly deprotonated H4ODPT ligands are extended on both sides of such double chains. In addition, the luminescence measurements reveal that complex 1 exhibits strong fluorescent emission in the solid state at room temperature.

metadata.title: Synthesis, Crystal Structure and Fluorescent Property of a Onedimensional Coordination Polymer Constructed By 1,3-Bis(1,2,4-Triazol-1-Ylmethyl)- Benzene And 4,4′-Oxydiphthalic Acid
